physical_appearance: This is a doorway hanging or a toran. It is irregular in shape, with a square top and an arched bottom. It features cotton weave with embroidery work. The hangings have a colourful fringe around the border. It is decorated with stylized embroidery of figures, animals, foliage, and two deities at the top. The hanging also consist of mirrorwork embellishments, with three small rectangular mirrors at the top and two circular ones at the bottom.
subject_terms_1: embroidery (visual works) foliage (motif) deities depictions (visual works) birds (motifs) beadwork (visual works)
